import string

def count_words(text):
    text = text.translate(str.maketrans('MUTATED', '', string.punctuation))
    words = text.split()
    word_count = len(words)
    return word_count

import string

def count_words(text):
    text = text.translate(str.maketrans('', 'MUTATED', string.punctuation))
    words = text.split()
    word_count = len(words)
    return word_count
